SQL.LOAD: SELECT header_id, claim_id, claim_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, is_exception, detail_id FROM elp_pickup_list_detail WHERE detail_id = :detail_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_CLAIM: SELECT header_id, claim_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, is_exception, detail_id FROM elp_pickup_list_detail WHERE claim_id = :claim_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_pickup_list_detail SET header_id = :header_id, claim_id = :claim_id, is_exception = :is_exception, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE detail_id = :detail_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_pickup_list_detail ( header_id, claim_id, claim_id, is_exception, created_by, detail_id ) VALUES ( :header_id, :claim_id, :claim_id, :is_exception, :created_by, :detail_id )
